wikipedia_page.main: Connor McManus (born 29 February 1996) is a Scottish footballer, who plays as a midfielder for East Fife. McManus has previously played for Celtic, Alloa Athletic Queen of the South, Greenock Morton and Stranraer. He recently rejoined East Fife on a 2 year deal.

link_mentions.page: 2016–17 Queen of the South F.C. season
